ComicInfo.Summary:
With Vampblade’s team of intergalactic and interdimensional friends assembled, they must now begin the final battle against the Glarkian armada for the fate of all Earth’s. No pressure!!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including the special Igor Chimisso variants!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Igor Chimisso | 3 | | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Igor Chimisso | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Ceri Langell | 5 | | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Ceri Langell | 6 |
Note: Issue #45 in a series.
ComicInfo.Title: Home Sweet Home Part Four
